A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too much plotholes\, too much humor in a serious movie\, and even more questions than the previous film. Also the fact that Rian Johnson has to explain each scene cause it has so many questions just shows that your movie was horrible. Let's not forget the Finn and Rose subplot that basically with or without didn't do anything to advance to storyline. All it did was make a political agenda in a si-fi movie. PATHETIC
